name: Wake Up (itch) (Ludzik)
description:
Story

Have you ever been stuck in a nightmare? No? This time you did. Try to find a way to wake up.

Note

For best experience play with headphones on, loud, in a dark room.

Settings

Movement - WASD

Looking around - Mouse

Tab - Check Objective

Pick Up/Open - Left Clcik

Drop/Close - Right Click

The only setting that can be adjusted is the sensitivity located in the pause menu.

Developer Note

It shouldn't take more than 10 minutes to finish game. Feel free to message me on my discord Ludzik#4958 to let me know feedback or future ideas. This game was made for the itch.io themed horror game jam #8
